snippet: The overlong pregame programming by NBC ran into the same pitfalls that other networks encountered, but showed glimpses of a way out.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column contends that most Super Bowl pre-game shows are bloated, moneymaking entities with little substantial content; notes that NBC's programming was at least well-paced and relatively football-oriented.
lead_paragraph: The overlong pregame programming by NBC ran into the same pitfalls that other networks encountered, but showed glimpses of a way out.

headline.seo: Super Bowl — Pregame Show by NBC Typically Overblown
headline.main: Personal Profiles Help Counter Excess of Pregame Show
headline.print_headline: Personal Profiles Help Counter Excess of Pregame Show
